thread.title: We see a lot of deflationary forces, says Ross Gerber

title: We see a lot of deflationary forces, says Ross Gerber
text:
We see a lot of deflationary forces, says Ross Gerber   03:45 
With twelve-month inflation rate at 2.1 percent and yields at up to 2.9 percent, it seems like rate have gone enough for now, says Ross Gerber, CEO of Gerber Kawasaki. Aleksandra Michalska reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
With twelve-month inflation rate at 2.1 percent and yields at up to 2.9 percent, it seems like rate have gone enough for now, says Ross Gerber, CEO of Gerber Kawasaki. Aleksandra Michalska reports.
